verses.verse: My <S%G5040>little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G1125>write<s%> I to you, that you <S%G264>sin<s%> not. And <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G264>sin,<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> an <S%G3875>advocate<s%> with the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous:<s%>
And he is the <S%G2434>propitiation<s%> for our <S%G266>sins:<s%> and not for <S%G2251>our's<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> for the sins of the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world.<s%>
And <S%G1722>hereby<s%> <S%G5129><s%> we do <S%G1097>know<s%> that we <S%G1097>know<s%> him, <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G5083>keep<s%> his <S%G1785>commandments.<s%>
He that <S%G3004>said,<s%> I <S%G1097>know<s%> him, and <S%G5083>keeps<s%> not his <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> is a <S%G5583>liar,<s%> and the <S%G225>truth<s%> is not in him.

But <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G5083>keeps<s%> his <S%G3056>word,<s%> in him <S%G230>truly<s%> is the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5048>perfected:<s%> <S%G1722>hereby<s%> <S%G5129><s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> we that we are in him.
He that <S%G3004>said<s%> he <S%G3306>stays<s%> in him <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> to <S%G4043>walk,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as he <S%G4043>walked.<s%>

<S%G80>Brothers,<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> to you, but an <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2192>had<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%> The <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> is the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%>

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> to you, <S%G3739>which<s%> thing is <S%G227>true<s%> in him and in you: <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G4653>darkness<s%> is <S%G3855>past,<s%> and the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G5316>shines.<s%>
He that <S%G3004>said<s%> he is in the <S%G5457>light,<s%> and <S%G3404>hates<s%> his <S%G80>brother,<s%> is in <S%G4653>darkness<s%> even <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now.<s%>
He that <S%G25>loves<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G3306>stays<s%> in the <S%G5457>light,<s%> and there is <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G4625>occasion<s%> of <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> in him.

But he that <S%G3404>hates<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> is in <S%G4653>darkness,<s%> and <S%G4043>walks<s%> in <S%G4653>darkness,<s%> and <S%G1492>knows<s%> not <S%G4226>where<s%> he <S%G5217>goes,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> that <S%G4653>darkness<s%> has <S%G5186>blinded<s%> his <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>
I <S%G1125>write<s%> to you, <S%G5040>little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven<s%> you for his <S%G3686>name's<s%> sake.

I <S%G1125>write<s%> to you, <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%> him that is from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> to you, <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>men,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G3528>overcome<s%> the <S%G4190>wicked<s%> one. I <S%G1125>write<s%> to you, <S%G3813>little<s%> <S%G3813>children,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

I have <S%G1125>written<s%> to you, <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G1097>known<s%> him that is from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> to you, <S%G3495>young<s%> <S%G3495>men,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you are <S%G2478>strong,<s%> and the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>stays<s%> in you, and you have <S%G3528>overcome<s%> the <S%G4190>wicked<s%> one.

<S%G25>Love<s%> not the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> the things that are in the <S%G2889>world.<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father<s%> is not in him.

For <S%G3956>all<s%> that is in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> the <S%G1939>lust<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> and the <S%G1939>lust<s%> of the <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> and the <S%G212>pride<s%> of <S%G979>life,<s%> is not of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> but is of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

And the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G3855>passes<s%> away, and the <S%G1939>lust<s%> <S%G846>thereof:<s%> but he that <S%G4160>does<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>stays<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%>

<S%G3813>Little<s%> <S%G3813>children,<s%> it is the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5610>time:<s%> and as you have <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G500>antichrist<s%> shall <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> are there <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G500>antichrists;<s%> <S%G3606>whereby<s%> we <S%G1097>know<s%> that it is the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5610>time.<s%>

They <S%G1831>went<s%> out from us, but they were not of us; for <S%G1487>if<s%> they had <S%G2258>been<s%> of us, they would no <S%G639>doubt<s%> have <S%G3306>continued<s%> with us: but they went out, that they might be <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> that they were not <S%G3956>all<s%> of us.
But you <S%G2192>have<s%> an <S%G5545>unction<s%> from the <S%G40>Holy<s%> One, and you <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things.

I have not <S%G1125>written<s%> to you <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> not the <S%G225>truth,<s%> but <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> it, and that <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5579>lie<s%> is of the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G5101>Who<s%> is a <S%G5583>liar<s%> but he that <S%G720>denies<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ?<s%> He is <S%G500>antichrist,<s%> that <S%G720>denies<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G5207>Son.<s%>

<S%G3956>Whoever<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G720>denies<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> the <S%G3761>same<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> not the <S%G3962>Father:<s%> he that acknowledges the Son <S%G2192>has<s%> the Father <S%G2532>also.<s%>

Let that <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> in you, <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G191>heard<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G191>heard<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning<s%> shall <S%G3306>remain<s%> in you, you <S%G2532>also<s%> shall <S%G3306>continue<s%> in the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> and in the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>
And <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G1860>promise<s%> that he has <S%G1861>promised<s%> us, even <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
<S%G5023>These<s%> things have I <S%G1125>written<s%> to you <S%G4012>concerning<s%> them that <S%G4105>seduce<s%> you.

But the <S%G5545>anointing<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G2983>received<s%> of him <S%G3306>stays<s%> in you, and you <S%G2192>need<s%> <S%G5532><s%> not that <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G1321>teach<s%> you: but as the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5545>anointing<s%> <S%G1321>teaches<s%> you of <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and is <S%G227>truth,<s%> and is <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5579>lie,<s%> and <S%G2531>even<s%> as it has <S%G1321>taught<s%> you, you shall <S%G3306>abide<s%> in him.

And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G5040>little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> in him; that, <S%G3752>when<s%> he shall <S%G5319>appear,<s%> we may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3954>confidence,<s%> and not be <S%G153>ashamed<s%> <S%G575>before<s%> him <S%G1722>at<s%> his <S%G3952>coming.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> that he is <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> that <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> of him.
